changes.comment:
Reworked the Rush task scheduler to use a custom AsyncTaskQueue that conforms to the ECMAScript async iteration protocol.
Indexed tasks during task generation by a composite key generated from the relevant [phase, project] tuple and added support to the scheduler to skip phases while preserving execution order effects.
Modified the TaskSelector to persist across an entire watch command invocation, instead of creating a new instance per build pass.
Revised build cache interaction to forbid writing to the build cache if any dependencies were skipped in the current execution.
